Articles.Content:
Mods used: Kerdi Auto Cavalcade and Kerbal Foundries wheels.

Aim of the mission: Drive to Ice Capes with the two mods listed above. Nothing more (not even stock parts), (hopefully) nothing less

Day 1: 

Munly Kerman is getting ready ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![tumblr_ns7cv5NGTz1tctfcdo1_1280.png](https://40.media.tumblr.com/be4802ca8fd68df7e7223513c8d836e1/tumblr_ns7cv5NGTz1tctfcdo1_1280.png)

Day 2: Munly is getting frustrated. It is going to take ages to get there, especially when Munly cannot read the map. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

![tumblr_ns95661dyY1tctfcdo1_1280.png](https://40.media.tumblr.com/4ee49ab1b6dee5ea8fdf7821990d25eb/tumblr_ns95661dyY1tctfcdo1_1280.png)

Hey man, this is an admirable challenge! Why not do it stock though? That rover is, I'm sorry to say, the ugliest thing I've ever seen!

 That aside I wish you the very best of luck, Kod speed little doodles.

> 
> Hey man, this is an admirable challenge! Why not do it stock though? That rover is, I'm sorry to say, the ugliest thing I've ever seen!
>  That aside I wish you the very best of luck, Kod speed little doodles.

I don't know which part of the rover you dislike, but the top (the car body) is my mod. 

Thanks, Munly should have enough food and music for this long trip.

DAY 4: Munly drove a few hours today and made an impressive progress. Look at the view!!

![tumblr_nsetet4ESx1tctfcdo1_1280.png](https://41.media.tumblr.com/bd10cc179c7a1a85d1aa83de46b6d23d/tumblr_nsetet4ESx1tctfcdo1_1280.png)

Day 8 (final day)

![tumblr_nsnvmjw3251tctfcdo1_1280.jpg](https://36.media.tumblr.com/a28933beade70b79320f6874da9ce293/tumblr_nsnvmjw3251tctfcdo1_1280.jpg)

After hours of driving, after so many times loading the quick save file, Munly has arrived at the border of the Northern Ice Caps. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> That rover is, I'm sorry to say, the ugliest thing I've ever seen!

It's not pretty, but I kinda like the bizarre way those giant rover wheels sprawl out of a car body. Endurance driving. Fun, but hard. Takes lots of commitment and time. Good luck with it!

> 
> It's not pretty, but I kinda like the bizarre way those giant rover wheels sprawl out of a car body. Endurance driving. Fun, but hard. Takes lots of commitment and time. Good luck with it!

Wheels could at least touch surface by their whole surface.

Also could have added more pictures, this amount of pictures for mission report is low. Great achievement, quater the circumnavigation, but we want to see more!
